channel.title: TitanScape Source + Client Release (With Tutorial)
channel.description:
Well long story short a friend of mine who i have known for a year was supposed to host world 1 for TitanScaper, while i hosted World 2. Sadly, once he recieved the source and client, he took all credits of mine out of them, and ipbanned me form the server. Also he renamed it CreationScape. (His name is Jake/My Creation/Torment.)
Anyway enough of the personal stuff.
All you have to do to get server going is: 1. Extract it to your homepage. 2. Go into the source files, into server.java and Search (Ctrl+f) Yourip. 3. Replace (youriphere) or (yourip) or whatever i put with your no-ip, or your actual ip if youre a trooper. 4. Compile, then head over to the client files. 5. Go into client.java and search (yourip 6. Repeat step 3. 7. Compile and there you go. You have now leeched my source and client! :D
Note: It is not required, but i ask of you to leave some credit of myself somewhere so people can see it. Such as the welcome message saying "Thank you cruel for this server." Idrc what you do, but it shows a sign of maturity if you dont just leech and say f#ck you Cruel, you released, idgaf what you think.
Anyway... The cache has titanscape all over it, if you are advanced, you can edit all the things that say titanscape, get a graphics designed to give you some new pictures, but if not, i wouldnt worry about it too much.
Some info on the server, its a 317, has working fullscreen in the client. There are no drops. I coded a unique system that instead of drops, you get points, which you then use to buy special items in the 2 fairy keepers at home.
Im not gonna post any pictures, im too lazy. If you want to post some below me once you have got your own server up, that would be greatly appreciated.
Has some great features.
Anyway, the moment of truth!
http://www.mediafire.com/?tet6ibkuf5r9k5a
Anyway thank you very much, and good luck with your server!
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gw4WhRQQCr8[/youtube]
Theres a vid of what the server looks like for those of you who want to know. Im just too lazy to go take pics lol.
UPDATE: Some people the run.bat doesnt work for the client, so if you get a error:
Edit Run.Bat in the client, and change
START java
To:
"c:/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" OR "c:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" OR "c:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.(version number)/bin/java.exe"
To find your version number, follow the path specified up there ^^ and wherever you have java installed, change the path to that.

item.title: TitanScape Source + Client Release (With Tutorial)
item.dc:creator: @Cruelty Cruelty
item.description:
@Cruelty wrote:

[quote=“All Time Low, post:33, topic:432583”]It Has No Java Path In The Run.Bat, Check It Yourself.
You Should Make A Tutorial On How To Jar The Client File.(:
-Underoath Xx / Miguel.[/quote]

There are a ton of tutorials on how to jar a client dude. Google ftw? Check rics webclient tutorial.

Now for the run thing, possibly for some people that doesnt work, so if you get a error

Edit Run.Bat in the client, and change

START java

To:

“c:/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe”
OR
“c:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe”
OR
“c:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.(version number)/bin/java.exe”

To find your version number, follow the path specified up there ^^ and wherever you have java installed, change the path to that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cruelty Cruelty
item.description:
@Cruelty wrote:

Huh i never had that problem with the client. I apologize if you are having this error, I have no idea what would cause it.

Maybe try jaring the client? No one ever had a problem opening the jar.

Im glad to see a lot of solid positive responses. Thank you very much, this makes all my work worth it.

I will check my pms, im currently really busy with my new server though.

item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Cruelty, post:5, topic:432583”][quote author=Mr Rushed link=topic=535296.msg3913582#msg3913582 date=1328985641]
Looks like tavlonia/runemtp/cautionx I looked at like 5 video’s and they all look like them nothing new…
[/quote]

Not true, it was actually originally a almost blank pi source and client. I coded almost the entire server. The points system in unique, I have never seen seen anything like it. There has been other titanscapes btw, you may have saw another vid, thats why i posted on that was actually from my server.[/quote]
I’ve seen that kind of point system before. On a lot of releases
